mapper.select: select * from User natural join User_Education_list natural join Education_list where e_mail = #{email}
select interest, e_mail from User_Interest_list natural join Interest_list where e_mail = #{email}
select MainTopic.mt_id from MainTopic join User on User.e_mail = MainTopic.e_mail where MainTopic.m_close = "O" and MainTopic.e_mail = #{e_mail}
select * from User join Participant on User.e_mail = Participant.e_mail and Participant.mt_id = #{mt_id};
